name: Truffle Macaroni and Cheese with Shrimp
author: Balancing Cinderella Recipes
summary: The truffle and bacon flavors add a depth to the Gorgonzola and Gruyere combination in this shrimp mac and cheese!
ingredients: 1 pound shrimp - peeled, tails removed, and cut in half
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spray a 8x10-inch glass baking dish with cooking spray
Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil
Stir in cellentani and return to a boil
Cook pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 13 minutes
Combine cream, egg white, and truffle salt in a large bowl
Add mushrooms, Gruyere cheese, bacon, and Gorgonzola cheese
Mix in cellentani pasta with a wooden spoon until evenly distributed
Pour pasta mixture into a the prepared baking dish
Bake in the preheated oven until top is bubbling and shrimp is opaque, 25 to 30 minutes
